home.title: BIODND - Empower Your Decisions with Life Science Company Database & Market Research
home.description: Make smarter decisions with BIODND, your go-to resource for life science data, regulatory insights, and industry trends tailored for leaders in biotechnology and pharmaceuticals. Streamline your deal sourcing effectively.

database.title: BIODND Database - Search and Discover Precise Life Science Data
database.description: Dive into BIODND's extensive life science database and market research tools to uncover valuable insights tailored for biotechnology and pharmaceutical leaders. Effortlessly search for companies, assets, and industry trends to streamline your decision-making process effectively.

event.title: BIODND Events: Partner, Invest & Innovate in Life Sciences
event.description: Explore BIODND's collaborative partnering conferences, uniting innovators from startups to Fortune 500 companies. Gain insights, identify investment opportunities, and forge lasting partnerships in the biotech ecosystem. Join us for investment, BD&L opportunities, and collective progress in advancing human health.

search_section.placeholder: Search by company name, keyword, or technology
search_section.title: A Precise Life Science Database for Industry Professionals to Make Smarter Decisions.
search_section.description:
BIODND leverages AI to streamline deal sourcing for life science executives, business development leaders, and investors, helping them identify promising opportunities faster.

Our precise database integrates company information across Asia, Europe, and North America, with valuable insights on funding, partnerships, and technology pipelines. Gain unmatched insights with AI-generated market reports and connect globally with our Bridging Experts & Institutions feature to optimize your strategic decisions.

graph_part.purple: Precise Database of APAC Life Science Companies
graph_part.blue: In-Depth Data from Global Research Institutes
graph_part.green: User-Friendly Bilingual Interface for Global Access

why_bio.title: Why You Should Choose
description_content: With our AI-Powered Search Tool, efficiently retrieve data with an AI-driven search engine, quickly finding biotech companies, clinical trials, and regulatory information to facilitate smoother interactions and decision-making.

BIODND’s AI-Generated Market Report, developed in collaboration with the Google AI Program, leverages advanced data analysis and machine learning to offer deeper market insights and trend predictions, providing you with unparalleled insights.

BIODND’s Bridging Experts & Institutions feature connects you with other experts, institutions, and teams through interactive tools, enhancing corporate collaborations and fostering effective communication.

purple.title: Streamline Decision-Making with Advanced Data Comparison Tools.
purple.description: Easily compare target companies within the BIODND database to uncover key similarities, differences, and emerging industry trends. Perfect for life science executives and analysts looking to gain a competitive edge.

green.title: Build Valuable Connections in the Life Sciences Sector.
green.description: Join the BIODND Member Network to connect, collaborate, and create partnerships with leading professionals across the globe. Ideal for fostering strategic relationships and expanding industry knowledge.

blue.title: Effortlessly Generate Custom Trend Reports.
blue.description: Utilize BIODND’s robust database to automatically produce detailed trend reports tailored to your specific industry needs. Essential for pharmaceutical and biotech analysts conducting market research or tracking industry advancements.

about_geneonline.title: About GeneOnline
about_geneonline.description:
GeneOnline Group is a B2B information and media company focusing on the life science sector. Its goal is to accelerate life science business opportunities through B2B exposure and data platforms. GeneOnline Media is the leading life science media outlet with a strong focus in the Asia market, reporting on the latest industry trends, and research focuses, and interviews with key opinion leaders in multiple languages.
GeneOnline Group is committed to delivering targeted media exposure services and business expansion solutions, helping you excel in the field of life sciences. We look forward to collaborating with you to shape a brighter future for the life science industry.

partnership_section.title: PARTNERSHIP
partnership_section.description: We have successfully built partnerships with these major biotech clusters and key clients in APAC and the US.

join_us_section.description:
Ready to Transform Your Strategic Insights?
Start Your Free BIODND Trial Today

about.title: ABOUT
about.p1: BIODND is an AI-powered industry database that accelerates deal sourcing processes for life science executives, BDs and investors.
about.p2: It integrates company information from Asia, Europe and North America, with plans to include additional information on academic institution teams.

form.terms_policy_after: You may receive SMS Notifications from us and can opt out any time.

Policy.title: Privacy Policy
Policy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.
Policy.usage: We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.This Privacy Policy has been created with the help of the <1>Privacy Policy Generator.</1>
Policy.interpretationContent: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.
Policy.definitionsContent: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:

terms.account: <0>Account</0> means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.
terms.affiliate: <0>Affiliate</0> means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where 'control' means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority.
terms.company: <0>Company</0> (referred to as either 'the Company', 'We', 'Us' or 'Our' in this Agreement) refers to Geneonline, 11F-A, No. 303, Section 4, Zhongxiao E Rd, Da’an District, Taipei City.
terms.cookies: <0>Cookies</0> are small files that are placed on Your computer, mobile device or any other device by a website, containing the details of Your browsing history on that website among its many uses.
terms.device: <0>Device</0> means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet.
terms.personalData: <0>Personal Data</0> is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.
terms.serviceProvider: <0>Service Provider</0> means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used.
terms.thirdPartySocialMediaService: <0>Third-party Social Media Service</0> refers to any website or any social network website through which a User can log in or create an account to use the Service.
terms.usageData: <0>Usage Data</0> refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).
terms.website: <0>Website</0> refers to BIODND, accessible from https://www.biodnd.com/
terms.you: <0>You</0> means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.

Policy.collectingPersonalDataTitle: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
Policy.personalDataDescription: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

personalDataList.name: First name and last name
personalDataList.address: Address, State, Province, ZIP/Postal code, City

usageData.description: Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service.
usageData.details: Usage Data may include information such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit, the time and date of Your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
usageData.details_2: When You access the Service by or through a mobile device, We may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device You use, Your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of Your mobile device, Your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser You use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
usageData.details_3: We may also collect information that Your browser sends whenever You visit our Service or when You access the Service by or through a mobile device.

thirdPartySocialMediaServices.title: Information from Third-Party Social Media Services
thirdPartySocialMediaServices.description: The Company allows You to create an account and log in to use the Service through the following Third-party Social Media Services:
thirdPartySocialMediaServices.additionalInfo: If You decide to register through or otherwise grant us access to a Third-Party Social Media Service, We may collect Personal data that is already associated with Your Third-Party Social Media Service's account, such as Your name, Your email address, Your activities or Your contact list associated with that account.
thirdPartySocialMediaServices.additionalInfo_2: You may also have the option of sharing additional information with the Company through Your Third-Party Social Media Service's account. If You choose to provide such information and Personal Data, during registration or otherwise, You are giving the Company permission to use, share, and store it in a manner consistent with this Privacy Policy.

trackingAndCookies.title: Tracking Technologies and Cookies
trackingAndCookies.description: We use Cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on Our Service and store certain information. Tracking technologies used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze Our Service. The technologies We use may include:
trackingAndCookies.description_2: Cookies or Browser Cookies. A cookie is a small file placed on Your Device. You can instruct Your browser to refuse all Cookies or to indicate when a Cookie is being sent. However, if You do not accept Cookies, You may not be able to use some parts of our Service. Unless you have adjusted Your browser setting so that it will refuse Cookies, our Service may use Cookies.
trackingAndCookies.description_3: Web Beacons. Certain sections of our Service and our emails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also referred to as clear gifs, pixel tags, and single-pixel gifs) that permit the Company, for example, to count users who have visited those pages or opened an email and for other related website statistics (for example, recording the popularity of a certain section and verifying system and server integrity).

cookiesTypes.persistent: Cookies can be 'Persistent' or 'Session' Cookies. Persistent Cookies remain on Your personal computer or mobile device when You go offline, while Session Cookies are deleted as soon as You close Your web browser.Learn more about cookies on the <1>Privacy Policies website</1> article.
cookiesTypes.below: We use both Session and Persistent Cookies for the purposes set out below:

necessary.title: Necessary / Essential Cookies
necessary.description: Purpose: These Cookies are essential to provide You with services available through the Website and to enable You to use some of its features. They help to authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts. Without these Cookies, the services that You have asked for cannot be provided, and We only use these Cookies to provide You with those services.

policyAcceptance.title: Cookies Policy / Notice Acceptance Cookies
policyAcceptance.description: Purpose: These Cookies identify if users have accepted the use of cookies on the Website.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.description: Purpose: These Cookies allow us to remember choices You make when You use the Website, such as remembering your login details or language preference. The purpose of these Cookies is to provide You with a more personal experience and to avoid You having to re-enter your preferences every time You use the Website.
functionality.description_2: For more information about the cookies we use and your choices regarding cookies, please visit our Cookies Policy or the Cookies section of our Privacy Policy.

personalDataUse.title: Use of Your Personal Data
personalDataUse.description: The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes:

purposes.serviceProvision: <0>To provide and maintain our Service</0>, including to monitor the usage of our Service.
purposes.accountManagement: <0>To manage Your Account</0>: to manage Your registration as a user of the Service.
purposes.contractPerformance: <0>For the performance of a contract</0>: the development, compliance and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items or services You have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the Service.
purposes.communication: <0>To contact You</0>: To contact You by email, telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication.
purposes.marketing: <0>To provide You</0> with news, special offers and general information about other goods, services and events which we offer.
purposes.requestsManagement: <0>To manage Your requests</0>: To attend and manage Your requests to Us.
purposes.businessTransfers: <0>For business transfers</0>: We may use Your information to evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Our assets.
purposes.otherPurposes: <0>For other purposes</0>: We may use Your information for other purposes, such as data analysis, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns.

personalDataSharing.description: We may share Your personal information in the following situations:

situations.withServiceProviders: <0>With Service Providers</0>: We may share Your personal information with Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service.
situations.forBusinessTransfers: <0>For business transfers</0>: We may share or transfer Your personal information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of Our business to another company.
situations.withAffiliates: <0>With Affiliates</0>: We may share Your information with Our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy.
situations.withBusinessPartners: <0>With business partners</0>: We may share Your information with Our business partners to offer You certain products, services or promotions.
situations.withOtherUsers: <0>With other users</0>: when You share personal information or otherwise interact in the public areas with other users, such information may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside.
situations.withYourConsent: <0>With Your consent</0>: We may disclose Your personal information for any other purpose with Your consent.

personalDataRetention.title: Retention of Your Personal Data
personalDataRetention.description: The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use Your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.
personalDataRetention.description_2: The Company will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period of time, except when this data is used to strengthen the security or to improve the functionality of Our Service, or We are legally obligated to retain this data for longer time periods.

personalDataTransfer.title: Transfer of Your Personal Data
personalDataTransfer.description: Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Company's operating offices and in any other places where the parties involved in the processing are located. It means that this information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of Your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from Your jurisdiction.
personalDataTransfer.description_2: Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by Your submission of such information represents Your agreement to that transfer.
personalDataTransfer.description_3: The Company will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that Your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of Your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of Your data and other personal information.

personalDataDeletion.title: Delete Your Personal Data
personalDataDeletion.description: You have the right to delete or request that We assist in deleting the Personal Data that We have collected about You.
personalDataDeletion.description_2: Our Service may give You the ability to delete certain information about You from within the Service.
personalDataDeletion.description_3: You may update, amend, or delete Your information at any time by signing in to Your Account, if you have one, and visiting the account settings section that allows you to manage Your personal information. You may also contact Us to request access to, correct, or delete any personal information that You have provided to Us.
personalDataDeletion.description_4: Please note, however, that We may need to retain certain information when we have a legal obligation or lawful basis to do so.

personalDataDisclosure.title: Disclosure of Your Personal Data
personalDataDisclosure.description: If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, Your Personal Data may be transferred. We will provide notice before Your Personal Data is transferred and becomes subject to a different Privacy Policy.
personalDataDisclosure.description_2: Under certain circumstances, the Company may be required to disclose Your Personal Data if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g. a court or a government agency).

personalDataOther.title: Other legal requirements
personalDataOther.description: The Company may disclose Your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:
list: Protect and defend the rights or property of the Company
Prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service
Protect the personal safety of Users of the Service or the public

security.title: Security of Your Personal Data
security.description: The security of Your Personal Data is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your Personal Data, We cannot guarantee its absolute security.

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.description: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13. If You are a parent or guardian and You are aware that Your child has provided Us with Personal Data, please contact Us. If We become aware that We have collected Personal Data from anyone under the age of 13 without verification of parental consent, We take steps to remove that information from Our servers.
childrensPrivacy.description_2: If We need to rely on consent as a legal basis for processing Your information and Your country requires consent from a parent, We may require Your parent's consent before We collect and use that information.

linksToOtherWebsites.title: Links to Other Websites
linksToOtherWebsites.description: Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit.
linksToOtherWebsites.description_2: We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

policyChanges.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
policyChanges.description: We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
policyChanges.description_2: We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy.
policyChanges.description_3: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us:

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small pieces of text used to store information on web browsers. Cookies are used to store and receive identifiers and other information on computers, phones and other devices. Other technologies, including data that we store on your web browser or device, identifiers associated with your device and other software, are used for similar purposes. In this policy, we refer to all of these technologies as 'cookies'.

usage.content: We use cookies if you have a BIODND account, use the website, or visit other websites that use the GeneOnline Products. Cookies enable GeneOnline to offer the GeneOnline Products to you and to understand the information that we receive about you, including information about your use of other websites and apps, whether or not you are registered or logged in.

sections.explains: This policy explains how we use cookies and the choices you have.Except as otherwise stated in this policy, the will apply to our processing of the data that we collect via cookies.

whereWeUse.title: Where do we use cookies?
whereWeUse.content: We may place cookies on your computer or device and receive information stored in cookies when you use or visit:
whereWeUse.content_3: Products provided by other members of the GeneOnline; and Websites and apps provided by other companies that use the GeneOnline Products, including companies that incorporate GeneOnline technologies into their websites and apps. GeneOnline uses cookies and receives information when you visit those sites and apps, including and information about your activity, without any further action from you.

typesOfCookies.title: What types of cookies do we use?

necessaryCookies.title: Necessary cookies
necessaryCookies.content: Necessary cookies allow us to offer you the best possible experience when accessing and navigating through our website and using its features. For example, these cookies let us recognize that you have created an account and have logged into that account.

functionalityCookies.title: Functionality cookies
functionalityCookies.content: Functionality cookies let us operate the site in accordance with the choices you make. For example, we will recognize your username and remember how you customized the site during future visits.

analyticalCookies.title: Analytical cookies
analyticalCookies.content: These cookies enable us and third-party services to collect aggregated data for statistical purposes on how our visitors use the website. These cookies do not contain personal information such as names and email addresses and are used to help us improve your user experience of the website.

howToDelete.title: How to delete cookies?
howToDelete.content: If you want to restrict or block the cookies that are set by our website, you can do so through your browser setting. Alternatively, you can visit www.internetcookies.com, which contains comprehensive information on how to do this on a wide variety of browsers and devices. You will find general information about cookies and details on how to delete cookies from your device.

Partner, Invest & Innovate
in Life Sciences
event_page.description: BIODND is a leading life science database and market research platform that fosters collaboration. Our diverse partnering conferences unite innovators of all sizes – from startups to Fortune 500 companies. Uncover industry trends, gain firsthand insights, identify investment opportunities, and forge lasting partnerships across the biotech ecosystem. Explore our event list below for investment, BD&L opportunities, and collective progress in improving human lives.
